mapper.update: update t_hospital set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},birth = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE},department = #{department.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},grade = #{grade.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},salary = #{salary,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select h.id,h.name,h.birth,h.department,h.grade,h.phone,h.salary, d.id did,d.depart ddepart, g.id gid,g.grade ggrade from (select id,name,birth,department,grade,phone,salary from t_hospital limit #{start},#{rows}) h left join t_department d on h.department = d.id left join t_grade g on h.grade = g.id

select h.id,h.name,h.birth,h.department,h.grade,h.phone,h.salary, d.id did,d.depart ddepart, g.id gid,g.grade ggrade from t_hospital h left join t_department d on h.department = d.id left join t_grade g on h.grade = g.id where h.department = #{id}
